file.name: local.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: MAGE Local Auth
  description: Mobile Awareness GEOINT Environment Local Authentication API
  contact:
    name: MAGE Support
    email: mage@nga.mil
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
  version: 0.0.0
servers:
- url: http://localhost:4242
paths:
  /auth/local/signin:
    post:
      tags: [ Auth ]
      description: Authenticate with username and password against the local MAGE database
      operationId: login
      requestBody:
        description: login request body
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/LocalCredentials'
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: authentication response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: { $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/User' }
  /auth/local/authorize:
    post:
      tags: [ Auth ]
      description: Authorize device ID
      operationId: authorize
      requestBody:
        description: Device ID to authorize
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              required:
              - uid
              type: object
              properties:
                uid:
                  type: string
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: Authorize response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/LoginResponse'
  /api/devices:
    get:
      tags:
      - Device
      description: Returns all devices
      operationId: getDevices
      responses:
        200:
          description: device response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/Device'
    post:
      tags:
      - Device
      description: add new device
      operationId: addDevice
      requestBody:
        description: new device body
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/DeviceCreate'
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: new device response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/Device'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /auth/local/authorize: post: operation "authorize": responses: 200: content: application/json: schema: parse schema: resolve "../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/LoginResponse": external "../openapi.yaml": file: local file reference is not allowed
